amendment.description: To create a point of order against legislation that includes deficit-financed tax cuts.

action.text: Amendment SA 1375 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive section 305(b)(2) of the CBA with respect to amendment SA 1375 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 234.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 305(b)(2) raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1375.

Amendment SA 1375 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Cardin to Amendment SA 1116. (consideration: CR S6621-6622; text: CR S6621) To create a point of order against legislation that includes deficit-financed tax cuts.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive section 305(b)(2) of the CBA with respect to amendment SA 1375 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 234.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1375 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Cardin to Amendment SA 1116.
